resources.string: This conversation will be archived, and you won\'t receive any new messages.
You\'ve blocked messages and calls from %1$s\'s Facebook account
Someone you\'ve blocked is in this group
If you continue, %1$s, %2$s and %3$s will be able to see and respond to messages that you send in this group chat.
If you continue, %1$s will be able to see and respond to messages that you send in this group chat.
If you continue, %1$s, %2$s and %3$s will be able to see and respond to messages that you send in this group chat.
If you continue, %1$s and %2$s will be able to see and respond to messages that you send in this group chat.
Log in with Facebook so that you can chat, attend events and share your VR experience with friends.
Connect with people on Oculus so that you can do fun activities together, including multiplayer games and group chats.
Your party has Oculus Rift users. When you launch into the selected application, Oculus Rift users won\'t be able to launch with you.
%1$s hasn\'t connected their account to Facebook, so they can\'t access chats.
Are you sure that you want to remove %1$s as your friend on Oculus?
You can travel to the party\'s location while you wait for others to join.
Travel to the party\'s location to meet up with other people in the party.
Couldn\'t send invitation. Please try again.
Couldn\'t cancel invitation. Please try again.

You can now use Messenger to connect with your friends wherever they are. Once you\'ve signed in to Messenger using your Facebook password, invite people you know to explore VR and jump into games with you. You can switch between Messenger and Oculus Chats whenever you want.

If you share your headset with friends and family, you can keep other people from seeing your messages by signing out of Messenger from the Messenger settings. To sign back in, select your Messenger profile and re-enter your password.

The Facebook Terms of Service and Supplemental Oculus Terms of Service will apply to you.

You can now switch between Messenger and Oculus chats to connect with your friends no matter where they are. Once you\'ve signed in to Messenger using your Facebook password, you can invite people you know to explore VR and jump into experiences and games together.

If you want to share your headset with friends and family, you can keep other people from seeing your messages by signing out of Messenger from the Messenger settings. To sign back in, select your Facebook profile and re-enter your password.

The Facebook Terms of Service and Supplemental Oculus Terms of Service will apply to you.

You can now switch between your Oculus and Messenger profiles and use Messenger to connect with your friends no matter where they are. Now that you\'re signed in, you can chat to friends and easily jump into games and experiences together.

If you choose to share your headset with friends and family, you can prevent other people from seeing your messages by signing out of Messenger from Messenger settings. When you want to sign back in, select your Facebook profile and re-enter your password.
To chat with your Oculus friends, select your profile from the top-left corner of this screen.

If you choose to share your headset with friends and family, you can prevent other people from seeing your messages by signing out of Messenger from Messenger settings. When you want to sign back in, select your Facebook profile and re-enter your password.
Your sign-in failed too many times. Please try again later.
People in this party will be able to see your Oculus activity independent of your activity setting.
This party can only be joined with an invitation.
Anyone with the link can join this party and share this link with their friends through Messenger. The party leader can turn off link sharing at any time.
Tell the party leader you are ready so that they can open the app for everyone.
You can travel to the party\'s location while you wait for others to join.
Travel to the party\'s location to meet up with other people in the party.
Couldn\'t send invitation. Please try again.
Couldn\'t cancel invitation. Please try again.
An error has occurred. You can start a new party or explore Oculus Home.
The party that you\'re trying to join is full. You can start a new party or explore Oculus Home.
The party that you\'re trying to join has ended or you can longer join it. You can start a new party or go back to where you were.
If you want to create a new party, you\'ll need to leave the one that you\'re in.
Unable to send invitation because your party is full.
People can find and join this party from a party member\'s profile.
Friends can join this party without an invitation
Anyone can share this link through Messenger. The link expires six hours after it has been created or once the party leader turns it off.
Couldn\'t send invitation. Please try again.
Your Facebook friends on Oculus will appear here
Connect with people you may know so that you can chat, play games together and more on Oculus.
Failed to send message. Please try again.
Are you sure that you want to remove %1$s as your friend on Oculus?
Log in with Facebook so that you can join virtual events and play multiplayer games with friends and more in VR.
Connect with your friends on Oculus using Oculus chats.
People in this party will be able to see your Oculus activity independent of your activity setting.
Choose an app for this party
Choose a location for this party
People can share the link with their friends through Messenger. You can update link sharing at any time from the party settings.

People you block can no longer invite you to events or parties, start a conversation with you, add you as a friend or see things that you post on your timeline. If you\'re friends, blocking someone will also unfriend them.
Are you sure that you want to leave?
Are you sure that you want to leave your current party? You won\'t be able to join this party again unless you are reinvited.
Changing this party from invitation-only to open to friends will make it visible to anyone who is a friend of someone in the current party.
Changing this party from open to friends to invitation-only will make it accessible only to people currently in the party or people you send invitations to.

Your friends and contacts will see when you\'re active or were recently active. You\'ll appear as active or recently active unless you turn off the setting wherever you\'re using Messenger or Facebook. You\'ll also see when your friends and contacts are active or were recently active. Learn More.
Once you sign out of Messenger, you won\'t be able to chat with Facebook friends from VR until you sign back in. You will still be able to use Oculus chats with your friends in VR.
Use Oculus system settings to define Messenger preferences.
